page.title: 11SCAMBLESBY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Scamblesby Church of England Primary is the only school left in the area.It {admits children in the term in which {they attain 5 years}and takes them through until they reach 11 yrs.There are currently{39 on roll}and numbers are rising.A "Mobile"classroom is now being installed to provide extra room. { Staff}are:the Headmaster and one Ass- istant Teacher;School Secretary;one Meals Supervisory Assistant & one Cle- ner In Charge.The 1st two are full time.The school has a{P.T.F.A.}which supports the school financially with about 3 times the money allocated by the County Council.Children come from as far as Swaby to the East and Benni- worth to the West by Parental preffer- ence.We have 2{B.B.C.'B'Micros.}That used for this script was won for us by David Essex,the winner of the{National {B.B.C.Micro-Ceefax Competion in 1985.
